description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you solve the mythical Tangram puzzle and transform all pieces into pure gold? Challenge your brain with 250 puzzle patterns for three different puzzle types. Or create and save your own puzzles in freestyle mode.
description.short: Can you solve the mythical Tangram puzzle and transform all pieces into pure gold? Challenge your brain with 250 puzzle patterns for three different puzzle types. Or create and save your own puzzles in freestyle mode.
